description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bg4rl","text":"This protocol details the mechanical dissociation of liver.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r3da","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"5tu58","text":"Depending on local laws and regulations, this protocol may need prior approval by the users' institutional review board (IRB) or equivalent ethics committee(s). Animal experiments for the establishment of this protocol were conducted in strict accordance with the guidelines established by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of Janssen Pharmaceutica N.V. and complied with the ARRIVE guidelines. The local Johnson \u0026 Johnson Ethical Committee approved all experimental protocols under project license number ‘Proj 037_02-AAV HBV / HDV’, and the actual experiments were carried out following the guidelines of the European Community Council directive of 24 November 1986 (Declaration of Helsinki 86/609/EEC). The mice were maintained and handled in AAALAC accredited animal facilities following institutional and national guidelines and regulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Robust isolation protocol for mouse leukocytes from blood and liver resident cells for immunology research

creator.name: Wim Pierson
creator.affiliation: ID Discovery, Infectious Diseases Therapeutic Area, Janssen Research and Development, Beerse, Belgium

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fjc4j","text":"Add   of FCS to a bottle of   of RPMI1640 with L-Glutamine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2js7h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"55","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkuju","text":"Prepare GentleMACS C-tubes by filling them with   RPMI 1640 medium + 10% FCS and store the tubes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"80hdv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvj85","text":"Fill the syringe with  PBS and connect a 23G needle to the syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebo5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq4hl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7sc9i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4uj7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dsec","text":"Euthanize the mice by decapitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d513n","text":"IMPORTANT! Proceed with liver perfusion shortly after euthanasia to prevent clotting of the blood.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"BF0B0026CE2947319DD854C9667E7D32"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6d3dr","text":"Position mouse in dorsal recumbency and pin down. Spray the abdominal and thoracic region with 70% EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"en310","text":"Make a parallel incision from the caudal to cranial side starting from the mouse’s abdomen until the thoracic region.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai5od","text":"Gently move the intestines to the right side to get access to the liver using forceps and carefully flip the median lobe and left lobe to the cranial side to visualize the portal vein. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"629ae","text":"Insert the tip of the needle in the hepatic portal vein. Slowly push   PBS through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fn8u5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ltl5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43i8g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ns3i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2r42f","text":"The liver will become tense and pale if the perfusion is correctly performed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"A6FC6FB25B644F358987479AC7D2A42E"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7m60g","text":"Carefully dissect the perfused liver and transfer into the C-tube containing the medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"u29s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ekd5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jeh5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c9v01","text":"Remove gallbladder during dissection of the mouse liver.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"BD58673E42D74AE5B3F475CCAA261EF6"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5basm","text":"Tightly close C-tube and attach it upside down onto the GentleMACS Octo Dissociator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9300t","text":"After termination of the program, detach C-tube from the GentleMACS Octo Dissociator and keep the tubes on ice until further processing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f8kmh","text":"Dispose the needle in an approved sharps container.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
